meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7369.

td.p: Anne Campbell, a homeschool educator from Frederick, Maryland
Damien Shirley, a digital consultant from Arlington, Virginia
Seth Wilson, a Ph.D. candidate from Chicago, Illinois (whose 8-day cash winnings total $191,701)

tr.td: BOY SCOUT LAW WORDS
A LOOK AT BOOKS
EPISODES OF THE SITCOM
IN-LAWS
YOU CAN'T FIGHT
CITY HALL

AnneWho is Daedelus?
$3,499
SethWho is Deadalus?
$4,000
Daedalus')
